articles.author: Paul Wiseman, Anne D'innocenzio, Mae Anderson
articles.title: Trump's erratic trade policies are baffling businesses, threatening investment and economic growth - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s ever-changing, on-again, off-again tariff war with America’s three biggest trading partners – Mexico, Canada and China — is baffling businesses and causing them to delay or cancel the investments that help drive economic growth. Trade…
